title: Purse, 1890–99
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metal, paste stones, and hair? (trimming)
Technique: tent stitch embroidery on gauze weave foundation
inscribed: stamped inside frame "STERLING MADE IN AUSTRIA"
description: Vertically symmetrical design of two chained stags looking upward at a raying sun with two eagles at the top. Another pair of eagles is at the bottom. Busy in-filling of foliage and geometric border. Two reds and yellow. Both sides are the same. Narrow geometric border separating the two sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 1890–99.Medium: linen, silk, metal, paste stones, and hair? (trimming)
Technique: tent stitch embroidery on gauze weave foundation. 1991-74-1.
